str2: From phos; to shed rays, i.e. To shine or to brighten up.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Management of household affairs, stewardship, administration. From oikonomos; administration; specially, a 'economy'.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a derivative of muo; a secret or 'mystery'.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
From the same as aei; properly, an age; by extension, perpetuity; by implication, the world; specially a Messianic period.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Neuter Singular
str2: To hide away, conceal, keep secret. From apo and krupto; to conceal away; figuratively, to keep secret.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: To create, form, shape, make, always of God. Probably akin to ktaomai; to fabricate, i.e. Found.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
